TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Constants extends System.Object

summary.span: 模組包含其他常數，
這些常數可用在程式碼當中的任何地方。

span.span: These constants can be used anywhere in your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個模組支援的許多 Visual Basic 的列舉型別成員對應的 Visual Basic 語言常數：This module supports the Visual Basic language constants that correspond to the members of many Visual Basic enumerations:

related.span: Visual Basic 執行階段程式庫成員

span.span: Indicates that the week specified by your system as the first week of the year should be used when date-related functions are called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫日期相關的函式時，您可以使用下列的列舉型別成員在您的程式碼來取代實際的值。When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values. 某些日期相關函式會採用`DayOfWeek`引數，`WeekOfYear`引數，或兩者。Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both. `FirstWeekOfYear`列舉會指定有效的值，如`WeekOfYear`引數，以及可能的傳回值的函式。The `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `WeekOfYear` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions. `WeekOfYear`引數會採用`FirstWeekOfYear`列舉型別成員。The `WeekOfYear` argument takes the `FirstWeekOfYear` enumeration members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫日期相關的函式時，您可以使用下列的列舉型別成員在您的程式碼來取代實際的值。When you call date-related functions, you can use the following enumeration members in your code in place of the actual values. 某些日期相關函式會採用`DayOfWeek`引數，`WeekOfYear`引數，或兩者。Some date-related functions take a `DayOfWeek` argument, a `WeekOfYear` argument, or both. `FirstDayOfWeek`列舉會指定有效的值，如`DayOfWeek`引數，以及可能的傳回值的函式。The `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration specifies the valid values for the `DayOfWeek` arguments, as well as the possible return values from the functions. `DayOfWeek`引數會採用`FirstDayOfWeek`列舉型別成員。The `DayOfWeek` argument takes the `FirstDayOfWeek` enumeration members. 日期相關的函數也會傳回`FirstDayOfWeek`值 (除了`System`)。Date-related functions also return `FirstDayOfWeek` values (except `System`).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性不是有效的`SetAttr`函式。This attribute is not valid for the `SetAttr` function. 當您呼叫`Dir`， `GetAttr`，或`SetAttr`函式，您可以使用`FileAttribute`中您的程式碼來取代實際值的列舉。When you call the `Dir`, `GetAttr`, or `SetAttr` functions, you can use the `FileAttribute` enumeration in your code in place of the actual values. `Attributes`引數會採用`FileAttribute`列舉型別成員。The `Attributes` argument takes the `FileAttribute` enumeration members. 執行檔案 I/O 作業時`My.Computer.FileSystem`物件提供更高效能和易用性比舊版的檔案 I/O 的方法。When performing file I/O operations, the `My.Computer.FileSystem` object provides greater performance and ease of use than legacy file I/O methods. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱物件。For more information, see object.
